text: The Guinea-Bissau national basketball team is the national basketball team from Guinea-Bissau. It has yet to appear at the FIBA World Championship or the FIBA Africa Championship. It is administered by the Federacao de Basquetebol da Guinée Bissau.FIBA National Federations – Guinea-Bissau, FIBA.com, accessed 23 February 2017. ==Competitive record== ===Summer Olympics=== yet to qualify ===World Championship=== yet to qualify ===FIBA Africa Championship=== yet to qualify ===African Games=== yet to qualify ===Lusophony Games=== *2006 : 5th *2009 : 5th *2014 : 6th *2017 : To be determined ==Current roster== At the 2011 Afrobasket qualification:Guinea-Bissau | 2011 African Championship for Men, ARCHIVE.FIBA.COM. Retrieved 24 August 2016.
